entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY AND BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
